pages.about: About Us | GraphiSpark About us Services Team Vacancies Pricing FAQ News Contact us Home About us Services Team Vacancies Pricing FAQ News Contact us Discover Our Story About Us At GraphiSpark, we are passionate about transforming data into visually compelling stories. Founded with a vision to revolutionize data presentation, our team combines creativity with analytical precision to deliver top-notch infographics. With years of experience in design and data analysis, we are committed to helping businesses and organizations effectively communicate their messages through powerful visuals. Join us on a journey to elevate your data and make an impact with our exceptional infographic solutions. Contact us Our Key Advantages Why Choose Us? At GraphiSpark, we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional infographic services that stand out. Our unique approach combines innovative design with data expertise to provide you with visually compelling solutions. Customized Designs Expert Team Fast Turnaround: Client-Centric Approach Contact us Innovation Creative Solutions Accuracy Precise Data Usability User-Friendly Punctuality Timely Delivery Transform Data into Stunning Visuals GET STARTED 100+ Projects 50+ Clients 10+ Years 15 Awards FAQ What is GraphiSpark? GraphiSpark is a company specializing in creating custom infographics that effectively communicate data and ideas through visually engaging designs. How can I request a quote? To request a quote, please visit our contact page and fill out the inquiry form with details about your project. We will get back to you with a customized quote. What is the typical turnaround time? The turnaround time varies depending on the complexity of the project. On average, we complete most infographics within 7-10 business days. Can I request revisions? Yes, we offer revisions to ensure the final product meets your expectations. The number of revisions included depends on the package you choose. What file formats will I receive? You will receive the final infographic in multiple file formats, including JPEG, PNG, and PDF, to ensure compatibility with various platforms and uses. Do you offer custom packages? Yes, we offer custom packages tailored to your specific needs. Contact us to discuss your requirements, and we will create a package that suits your project. pages.privacy: Privacy Policy | GraphiSpark About us Services Team Vacancies Pricing FAQ News Contact us Home About us Services Team Vacancies Pricing FAQ News Contact us Privacy Policy Introduction This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website. Please read this policy carefully. Information We Collect We collect information that you provide to us directly, including personal details such as your name, email address, and contact information. How We Use Your Information The information we collect is used to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and fulfill your requests and transactions. Cookies and Tracking Technologies We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website, analyze usage, and personalize content. Third-Party Services We may share your information with third-party service providers to assist us in delivering our services or for marketing purposes. These providers are bound by confidentiality agreements. Data Security We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no data transmission over the internet is completely secure. Your Data Protection Rights Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal data, including the right to access, correct, delete, or restrict its processing. Data Retention We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, comply with legal obligations, and resolve disputes. Children's Privacy Our website is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under this age. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. Your Choices You can choose not to provide certain information or adjust your browser settings to refuse cookies. However, this may limit your ability to use certain features of our website. Contact Information If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us using the information provided on our contact page. Legal Compliance We comply with applicable laws and regulations related to the collection and use of personal data. We may disclose your information if required by law or in response to legal requests. Data Accuracy We strive to keep your data accurate and up-to-date. Please notify us of any changes to your personal information so we can make necessary updates. International Data Transfers Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries outside your residence. We ensure that adequate safeguards are in place to protect your data. Automated Decision-Making We do not engage in automated decision-making that significantly affects you, except where necessary for the performance of a contract or with your consent. Links to Other Websites Our website may contain links to other websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these external sites. Third-Party Advertising We may use third-party advertising partners to deliver ads on our website. These partners may use cookies and tracking technologies to collect information about your interactions with ads. Social Media Features Our website may include social media features, such as sharing buttons. These features may collect information about your interactions with them and are governed by the privacy policies of the social media platforms. Data Protection Officer If applicable, we have appointed a Data Protection Officer to oversee compliance with data protection laws and address any related concerns or queries. Privacy Policy Scope This Privacy Policy applies to all personal data collected through our website and services. It does not apply to third-party sites or services that may be linked to our website. User Rights and Access You have the right to request access to the personal data we hold about you, and to request corrections or deletions of that data, subject to legal requirements. Account Deactivation If you wish to deactivate your account, please contact us. We will process your request and take appropriate steps to deactivate your account while retaining necessary data for legal or operational reasons. Third-Party Services We may use third-party service providers to perform certain functions on our behalf, such as payment processing, data analysis, and email delivery. These service providers have access to your personal information only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated to protect your information and use it only for the purposes specified by us. Behavioral Advertising We may use your information to provide you with targeted advertisements or marketing communications we believe may be of interest to you. This involves the use of cookies and similar technologies to track your interactions with our website and tailor the advertisements you see. You can opt-out of behavioral advertising by adjusting your browser settings or using opt-out tools provided by advertising networks. Data Breach Response In the event of a data breach, we will take prompt action to investigate the breach and mitigate its effects. We will notify affected individuals and regulatory authorities as required by law and provide information on the nature of the breach, the affected data, and the steps we are taking to address the situation. Contact Information: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, or if you would like to exercise your rights regarding your personal information, please contact us at graphispark@gmail.com Nashik, Maharashtra, India +912353263262 graphispark@gmail.com Privacy Policy Home About us Services Team Vacancies Pricing FAQ News Contact us
